welcome_message: Your health, our priority. Discover personalized care, smart appointment scheduling, and seamless medical services.
about_message: We combine technology and compassion to deliver the best healthcare experience. With our smart system, you can manage appointments, access your medical records, and consult with experts anytime, anywhere.
you_do_not_have_permission_to_access_thi: You do not have permission to access this page.

hero_title_new: Your doctor, online — diagnosis & treatment in one step
hero_sub: Tell us your symptoms online and get diagnosis and treatment directly from the doctor — no waiting rooms, no delays.
from_home: From the comfort of your home
how_it_works_sub: Just three steps to receive your diagnosis
step1_text: Fill out the form with your symptoms online.
step2_text: The doctor analyzes your case and prepares a diagnosis.
step3_text: Get your diagnosis and treatment plan directly.
why_us: Focused on speed, comfort, and clarity
benefits_sub: A streamlined online process that saves you time and provides trusted medical advice.
benefit1: No need to travel to the clinic
doctor_bio: Experienced physician providing online consultations to diagnose and treat patients quickly and securely.
cta_sub: Submit your symptoms now and receive your treatment plan directly from the doctor.
